roleset.name: suggest someone take a role
roleset.note: NOMINATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls appoint-29.1. (from nominate.01-v)
NOMINATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls appoint-29.1. (from nomination.01-n)
RENOMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, nomination.01. Corresponds to VNcls Vncls appoint-29.1. (from renomination.01-n)

example.name: unmentioned role
example.text: [The remaining four trustees on the Claimants Trust]-1 have 60 days *trace*-1 to nominate a successor to Mr. Saltzburg.
example.arg: *trace*-1 (= The remaining four trustees on the Claimants Trust)

example.name: role as infinitive
example.text: Antonio Novello, whom Mr. Bush nominated *trace* to serve as surgeon general, reportedly has assured the administration that she opposes abortion.

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The Bush administration 's nomination of Clarence Thomas to aseat on the federal appeals court here
example.arg: to a seat on the federal appeals court here

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Breeden 's nomination to the SEC post

example.name: Light Verb!
example.text: How-1 to *PRO* Make a Nomination for the 2011 Governor's Arts Awards *trace*-1.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The last time something like this happened that I know of ; was the republican convention in New York for the renomination of Bush Jr for a second term in office .
example.arg: for a second term in office
